Paragraph: The number - average molecular weights ( M n ) of PTATDPP and PTAFDPP were 47.2 and 32.6 kDa with polydispersity indexes ( PDI ) of 2.1 and 2.5 , respectively , as determined by size - exclusion chromatography.

| PTAFDPP |

Of course! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material name", presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

I removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name":

* "average molecular weights" (this refers to a property of the material, not the material name itself)
* "polydispersity indexes" (this refers to a property of the material, not the material name itself)

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
